identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a vibrant, high-contrast conference management system that breaks the 'boring admin panel' stereotype.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix SaaS utility with Event Poster aesthetics.
Emotion First: The dashboard should feel 'alive' and 'happening', not static.
Content is King: Data is the star, but frame it beautifully.
Zoom In: Use bold metrics and large avatars.
Negative Space: Generous padding even in dense data views.
Contrast: High contrast text for readability against deep backgrounds.

headings.usage: All page titles, card headers, and major metrics.

body.usage: General text, tables, form inputs, buttons.

mono.usage: IDs, API keys, code snippets, technical data.

typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400&family=Manrope:wght@400;500;600&family=Outfit:wght@500;700&display=swap');

usage_rules: Primary (Electric Purple): Main CTAs, active states, key brand moments.
Secondary (Vibrant Green): Success states, growth metrics, 'Go' actions.
Background: Deep Navy/Slate in dark mode, not pure black.
Gradients: Use subtle gradients on Primary buttons (Purple to Pink) for 'Vibrant' feel.

grid_rules: Main Charts: col-span-2 row-span-2 or col-span-3

alignment.numbers: Right-aligned or tabular nums for data.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-lg shadow-primary/20 rounded-md font-medium
buttons.outline: border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary/10 rounded-md font-medium

inputs.style: bg-input/20 border-input focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-md h-10

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-md bg-background/80 for sticky headers and overlays.
visual_enhancers.gradients: Use 'bg-gradient-to-r from-primary to-accent' for text-transparent-clip on Hero Headings.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Use colored shadows for primary elements: shadow-[0_4px_14px_0_rgba(139,92,246,0.39)].
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 'border-white/10' for subtle separation in dark mode.

motion.loading: Use skeleton loaders with 'animate-pulse' instead of spinners where possible.

images.strategy: Use high-quality, relevant photography for 'human' touch in a data-heavy app.

sources.usage: Speaker profiles, User avatars (crop to face).
Event cover images, Login page background (with overlay).

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a Conference Management Dashboard. It must look premium, vibrant, and modern. Do not build a boring gray admin panel.
setup: Update /app/frontend/src/index.css with the provided color variables.
Ensure all Shadcn components use the new 'radius' and color variables.

pages.login: Split screen. Left: 'Crowd/Atmosphere' image with heavy purple/blue overlay and branding. Right: Clean login form.
pages.dashboard: Use the 'Control Room Grid'. Top: 4 summary cards (Attendees, Revenue, Speakers, Exhibitors). Middle: Large 'Ticket Sales' chart (Area Chart) + 'Recent Registrations' list. Bottom: 'Upcoming Events' grid.
pages.user_management: Data table with 'Avatar' column, 'Role' badges (colored by role), and 'Actions' dropdown.
pages.event_creation: Multi-step wizard or long-form with sticky header. Use 'Card' components to group sections (Basic Info, Date/Time, Location).

components.charts: Use Recharts (via Shadcn Charts). Style them to match the theme (e.g., Purple lines, Green bars).
components.navigation: Sidebar navigation. Dark background. Active item: 'bg-primary/10 text-primary border-r-2 border-primary'.
components.header: Sticky top bar. Glassmorphism. Breadcrumbs on left, User Profile + Notifications on right.

instructions_to_main_agent.testing: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links) in kebab-case (e.g., 'login-submit-btn', 'event-create-input').

avoid: Default Shadcn slate colors without customization.
